TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Malaloong, title = Malaloong, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malaloong} }

S.FORM: alang Malaloong ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Toyohama go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 137 buwan, 342 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 91% kyan ku 310 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 9% kyan ku 32 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 68%, Paywan 1%, Rukay 1%, Kebalan 18%, binah lihuyan s'uli 4%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal psatu tegami ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Malaloong hya' ga bsilung. tay 'zil na Malaloong hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyahu' na Malaloong hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Malaloong hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Malaloong hya' ga Paterungan. tay mkyahu' na Malaloong hya' ga Tingalaw. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Malaloong ga niya mki sko Karing Keng ato Toyohama go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 137 bowan, 342 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 91% kyan ko 310 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 9% kyan ko 32 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 68%, Paywan 1%, Rokay 1%, Kebalan 18%, binah lihoyan s'oli 4%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ngasal psato tegami ro pqniqan iyo. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Malaloong hya' ga bsilong. tay 'zil na Malaloong hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyaho' na Malaloong hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Malaloong hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Malaloong hya' ga Paterongan. tay mkyaho' na Malaloong hya' ga Tingalaw. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
